Articles.Content:
Which is the newer version that the tutorials are correct?

I tried 1.4 (the last I played) and I think this one is OK. The 1.12 has some mistakes... Anyone has tested other versions?

The tutorials are possible to complete, by following their instructions, in version 1.7.3.   

Based on when the bugs were reported with the tutorials, it looks like the bugs appeared in version 1.12

There is a thread about which KSP version is the best.

Edited December 4, 2021 by OHara
